en.today: The energy could feel slightly rigid when you awaken, dear Aries, as the moon enters Capricorn and squares Venus Rx. Harsh reality checks may force you to take accountability for issues you thought were buried, though you'll have a chance to set matters straight once and for all. Think carefully before speaking as afternoon emerges and Luna enters a tense aspect with Mercury Rx, or you could talk yourself into a corner. Connect with your sense of balance and make time for personal pampering or romance when the sun and Venus rx join forces to lighten the mood.

en.today: Your patience wears thin this morning as the Capricorn moon squares Venus rx, dear Gemini. Focus on finding balance before stepping into the world, protecting your energy to prevent triggers from taking hold. Steer clear of negative conversations and gossip this afternoon while Mercury rx becomes agitated. Peers could find it difficult to keep conversations private during this time, and your words might come back to haunt you. Also, steer clear of social media and news feeds to give yourself a mental breather. The atmosphere shifts when the sun and Venus rx unite this evening, creating a more communal and socially safe energy.
